TEXT.S: gaga psani' skura yow na nni'an (1)iyik na nbuw uwow ga tmring uwow tluling ro rpusun gleng uwow, skura lutux bnkisan ro msina howey na lutux . (2)ini kani' hoyin, patung ro tla'ung, kani' laga kba' mga'in. (3)mrkyas ro la'iy ga ini kani' tunux sinuw, ro biyux sinuw, ro kakey na sinuw uy. (4)suley ro pipi na sinuw, la'iy ga ini hmtiy mani' mani' laga hlow mrpyut insuna, kwara kwe ga nanak bnkis ga thoyey mani'. (5)uwah mtisan Sali lpyung ga ini kani' bih tanux Sali' kya, kwara nni'an ga spni'an na lpyung, ro bkis lama mani', la'iy ga puting mani'. Bnrwan qa galan cpung : Yawi Nomin .( : . 101)
